comments.body: We won't actually publish a custom README, maybe this should be moved to `index.d.ts`?

This was modeled after the ```@types/angular``` definition. I'm aware that it wont be published to NPM, but there is a link from NPM directly to the definition page within the repository. I don't think it's the kind of thing that makes it directly into the definition file, especially not without markup.

I'll remove it if this isn't something you're interested in having within the repository.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@```

### Exposing Private Methods and Properties

[Declaration Merging](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/declaration-merging.html) can be used to augment any of the types used within Atom Keymap. As an example, if we wanted to reveal the private ```partialMatchTimeout``` property within the KeymapManager class, then we would create a file with the following contents:
